title: why does captcha keep dropping out and sending message, "can't contact captchka"
content: I am really tired of having to download the "captcha" files over and over. What am I doing wrong?

title: Pinned Tabs doesn't work at windows 11
content: When I use windows 10, pinned tabs were worked properly. But in windows 11 I pinned tab at mozila firefox. I quit with my some of tabs are pinned. But when I again start firefox my pinned tabs are gone. This is so disappointing to me. I didn't face this type of problem at windows 10.
creator: bmfahimreza

title: Videos Not Working`
content:
No video players work with Firefox but they work fine in Chrome

I have the latest version downloaded, I have tried debugging, private windows, cache and cookie clear, reinstalled/reset firefox, restarted my computer, updated my GPU drivers, changed every setting such as autoplay, hardware acceleration etc., disabled all enhancements, and more.

Nothing fixes this. I get error codes on every site i try, twitch, streamable, etc. None play videos.
creator: boe44178

title: possible bug
content: My device has acted strange in that sometimes the browsing data is not mine and the browser actually said target client! What would cause this?
creator: welder411
